revisionDesc.change: checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab:
Under your detail by the Commissioner of Internal Revenue, you will proceed to Raleigh, N. C., and there report such proceedings at the term report at Raleigh N. C.
of the U. S. Circuit Court, to commence on the 13th instant, as Judge Bond shall desire to have reported.
Your expenses upon this trip will be defrayed by this Department.
